segments.text: There's a boy standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how precarious his position looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilted, and he's stretching as high as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice his plate, ready to catch cookies or perhaps to cover his tracks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so focused on the jar, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he might fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks eager, almost as if she's cheering him on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the open cabinet doors framing the boy, highlighting his risky climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit amusing to see their teamwork, but also quite dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I also hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
